title: Oeufs en Meurette
instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy. Remove and set aside.
2. Saut√© onions and mushrooms in the same pan until softened.
3. Add butter and flour, stirring to make a roux. Gradually add red wine and beef stock, whisking until smooth. Simmer to reduce.
4. Poach the eggs in simmering water until whites are set and yolks are runny.
